comments: a(n) != 1 (mod n) iff n = 4p where p == +-1 (mod 8) such that 2^p-1 is prime; that is, for n = 28, 68, 124, 356, 508, ... - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jan 02 2014Conjecture: a(n) != 1 (mod n) iff n = 4 * A001153(m) for m >= 4. - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jan 03 2014A002326((a(n)-1)/2) = n iff n is odd or n is even such that a(n/2) != a(n). - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jan 11 2014

formula: a(n) = a(2n) iff a(n) > A002587(n). a(n) = a(2n) = a(4n) iff n is prime p == +-1 (mod 8) and 2^p-1 is prime. - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jan 07 2014
